ARABIC: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Before them the people of Nuh also denied the truth and the Companions of Rass and Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The people of Noah, Ar-Rass and Thamud denied before you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In the past Noah's people, and the people of Rass and Thamud gave the lie (to Messengers),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of Noah, dwellers of the Ra's, Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Before these, the people of Nooh had denied, and so did the dwellers of Rass and the Thamud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Denied before them the people of Nuh, and the Dwellers of Rass, and Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (Others) before them rejected (prophets): the people of Nuh and the dwellers of Ar-Rass and Samood,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Cried lies before them the people of Noah and the men of Er-Rass, and Thamood,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The folk of Noah denied (the truth) before them, and (so did) the dwellers at Ar-Rass and (the tribe of) Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Before them, the people of Noah and the people of Rass denied this truth; and so did the people of Thamud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And before them the people of Nuh belied, and so did the dwellers Of Rass and the Thamud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The people of Noah denied before them, and [so did] the people of Rass and Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Before them was denied (the Hereafter) by the People of Noah, the Companions of the Rass, the Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Denied before them (i.e. these pagans of Makkah who denied you, O Muhammad SAW) the people of Nuh (Noah), and the dwellers of Rass, and the Thamud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Before them, the nation of Noah, the nation of ArRass belied and so did Thamood
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Before them the people of Noah denied the truth, and so did the dwellers of Russ, and Thamood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:12] The people of Noah denied before them (kadhdhabat has a feminine person inflection because of the [feminine gender of the] import of qawm, ‘people’) and [so did] the dwellers at al-Rass — this was the name of a well around which they dwelt together with their livestock; they worshipped idols, and it is said that their prophet was one Hanzala b. Safwān; but some say that he was some other [person] — and Thamūd, the people of Sālih,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 605 (The folk of Noah denied) denied Noah (before them) before your folk, Muhammad, (and (so did) the dwellers at al-Rass) al-Rass is a well close to al-Yamamah; the dwellers of al-Rass are the people of Shu'ayb who denied Shu'ayb (and (the tribe of) Thamud) the people of Salih,
